name: gunther-bot
description: Repo for my personal discord bot.

scripts.deploy: node deploy-commands.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.global-deploy: node global-deploy-commands.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.init-database: node initialize-database.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss

author: beansquared
